                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Oh damn, he's got a great
                                                                                voice,&quot; I bobbed my head a bit.
                                                                                What do you know, the hat sang pretty
                                                                                well without working lungs.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Yeah, he sang the whole thing. Not a bad
                                                                                song though. The whole hall erupted into
                                                                                applause when he finished slaying the
                                                                                lyrics, to which he bowed.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;I'm going to <i>kill</i>
                                                                                Fred!&quot; Ron hissed to Harry and I,
                                                                                looking more relieved than angry.
                                                                                &quot;He said we had to wrestle a
                                                                                troll!&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;If you did, I'd recommend taking
                                                                                his knees out,&quot; I joked.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Yer mental mate!&quot; Ron
                                                                                laughed.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Harry looked a bit more nervous, but he
                                                                                was also looking between the hat and
                                                                                me.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                McGonagall let the clapping go for a
                                                                                bit. Then she took a single step
                                                                                forward.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                And everyone shut the fuck up. That's
                                                                                all it took for her to assert
                                                                                authority.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Daaaaaayum,&quot; I mumbled.
                                                                                &quot;That's hot.&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;What!?&quot; Hermione squealed in
                                                                                shock.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;N-Nothing,&quot; I mumbled.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                I admit nothing, and shut up.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;When I call your name, you will
                                                                                put on the hat and sit on the stool to
                                                                                be sorted,&quot; she said. &quot;Abbott,
                                                                                Hannah!&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Its alphabetical?&quot; I mumbled,
                                                                                watching as a tiny girl with blonde
                                                                                pigtails and deep blush rushed
                                                                                forward.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Is that a problem?&quot; I turned
                                                                                to see Daphne. She was smirking.
                                                                                &quot;What's your last name?&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Ahmed,&quot; I copied her
                                                                                expression. &quot;Good for you, right?
                                                                                You get to accept your loss gracefully
                                                                                right from the start.&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;HUFFLEPUFF!&quot; the hat called
                                                                                out.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                The badger house roared with cheers, the
                                                                                Fat Friar joining in.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Gar,&quot; Harry mumbled to me.
                                                                                When I looked at him, he sighed.
                                                                                &quot;I'll go into
                                                                                Hufflepuf-&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Fuck that,&quot; I told him.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Uh�&quot; he looked
                                                                                startled.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Ahmed, Gareth!&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                I walked backwards towards the hat,
                                                                                holding my hands out. &quot;Like I said,
                                                                                brother. Houses don't matter,&quot; I
                                                                                said just low enough that only the
                                                                                people in on the bet could hear.
                                                                                &quot;Pick your house, then let's show
                                                                                these wizards how we do it downtown,
                                                                                huh?&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Ghostbusters, really?&quot;
                                                                                Harry's surprise turned into a shaking
                                                                                of his head and a smile.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;It's a great line!&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                I spun around and moved over to the hat.
                                                                                Then I put it on. And there was
                                                                                blackness.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;... Hmm.&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                A small voice. In my ear. No. In my
                                                                                mind. &quot;Now that is
                                                                                difficult.&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Do you want any help cleaning up
                                                                                by the way?&quot; I asked as I noted the
                                                                                smell. Well. More like I tried to
                                                                                project my thoughts to him. &quot;No
                                                                                offense. Just, it's weird an
                                                                                uber-important artifact is literally
                                                                                covered in dirt.&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Oh? I prefer to consider it part
                                                                                of my charm,&quot; he mumbled, though I
                                                                                could hear the chuckle. &quot;And you do
                                                                                know a lot about me, don't you. But of
                                                                                course you do. You aren't from around
                                                                                here.&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                You had to see it coming.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Hmmmm. Those are interesting. I
                                                                                can't read minds, young man, but I can
                                                                                read the basics. It's rare I meet
                                                                                someone so strange. I think, 1984. I saw
                                                                                greatness in that one. In you, I see
                                                                                ambition. Strong thirst for that
                                                                                greatness I saw in the last. Slytherin
                                                                                wouldn't enjoy a muggleborn in his
                                                                                house, but there is no doubting you have
                                                                                all his other desired traits in
                                                                                spades.&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                He chuckled. &quot;But I also see more.
                                                                                You don't care about the house do you?
                                                                                You wish these students to discard those
                                                                                ideas.&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;I'm a punk at heart.&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Ha!&quot; he chuckled. &quot;Yes.
                                                                                Any house will do. But I know your wish.
                                                                                I hope Mr. Potter will be as interesting
                                                                                as you.&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;More, probably.&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Haha! Then, it better be�
                                                                                HUFFLEPUFF!&quot; I took off the hat and
                                                                                grinned.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Ron, Hermione, Harry, and Neville stared
                                                                                at me. Ahh, but I only had eyes for one
                                                                                girl.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Daphne Greengrass was pouting. Go right
                                                                                ahead girl. You promised to give my
                                                                                ideas a chance.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Not much chance in spreading those ideas
                                                                                if they didn't have a way into
                                                                                Slytherin.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                I hopped down and moved over to the
                                                                                table of choice, plopping down.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                One after another, the others were
                                                                                called up. Hermione put on the hat with
                                                                                a determined look. I could see her
                                                                                whispering furiously under it for a
                                                                                moment.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;GRYFFINDOR!&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                When the hat came off, she looked at me
                                                                                thoughtfully.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Daphne was next. Like Hermione, she
                                                                                whispered, though she was quicker.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;SLYTHERIN!&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                She looked at me, but with a more severe
                                                                                pout than before. Still, she gave me a
                                                                                nod. Confirming I wasn't lying maybe? I
                                                                                owed the hat a magical laundry
                                                                                service.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Neville was fast, which surprised me. He
                                                                                put the hat on. And moments later it
                                                                                called out.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;GRYFFINDOR!&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Didn't he take a while in the
                                                                                book?<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Nothing else changed though. Malfoy
                                                                                ended up in snake house, no duh,
                                                                                everyone went their usual ways.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                And then. &quot;Potter,
                                                                                Harry!&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Harry stepped forward. Ron looked
                                                                                gobsmacked. Fred and George grinned,
                                                                                turning to a black teenager who was
                                                                                cursing as he handed them a bunch of
                                                                                coins. Hermione gasped.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                The loud whispers of shock continued up
                                                                                until Harry put the hat on.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;...&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                I swear to god, the hat looked at me,
                                                                                then shrugged. Oh god, Harry, please
                                                                                don't-<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;GRYFFINDOR!&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Lion house roared in a chorus of cheers
                                                                                louder than could have been
                                                                                believed.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Harry took the hat off. I raised a fist
                                                                                in the air and got one back, before he
                                                                                headed to the Gryffindor Table.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                The names continued. Up until Ron.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                He still looked shocked as hell. Still,
                                                                                he went up there and put it on. For
                                                                                about a second.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;GRYFFINDOR!&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Thank fucking god. I'm gonna burn this
                                                                                institution's rules to the ground, but I
                                                                                didn't want to interfere with where the
                                                                                others were placed. It's a thin line I
                                                                                walk- Why were both the Patil's in
                                                                                Gryffindor?<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                What the fuck? Who else had gotten mixed
                                                                                up!?<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                I think Percy was saying something to
                                                                                Ron, but he was asking Harry something.
                                                                                Harry cheekily grinned and answered with
                                                                                something that might as well have
                                                                                smacked Ron like a live fish to the
                                                                                face.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Albus Dumbledore, the Man With Style
                                                                                (Fuck, I have to stop doing that) rose
                                                                                up once Blaise headed to Slytherin and
                                                                                McGonagall had rolled up the scroll and
                                                                                put away the stool. He seemed
                                                                                cheery.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Welcome,&quot; he said.
                                                                                &quot;Welcome to a new year at Hogwarts!
                                                                                Before we begin out banquet, I would
                                                                                like to say a few words. And here they
                                                                                are: Nitwit! Blubber! Oddment!
                                                                                Tweak!<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Thank you!&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                You old nutter of a wizard.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                I chuckled and looked down. Lets see�
                                                                                yeah. It was AMAZING food.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                All the offerings were available man, it
                                                                                was insane. I focused on the essentials.
                                                                                Vegetables, protein, and a good
                                                                                drink.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Ahhh, such a shame I can't
                                                                                partake,&quot; the Fat Friar, a chubby
                                                                                ghost hovering just by Hannah
                                                                                Abbott.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                The blond looked nervously at him.
                                                                                &quot;Why not?&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Oh sweetie, ghosts can't eat. We
                                                                                do miss it of course!&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;I think I need to ask you some
                                                                                questions about this sort of
                                                                                thing,&quot; I pointed a fork at him.
                                                                                &quot;Ghost shows up, makes a man
                                                                                question the afterlife.&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Fat Friar chuckled. &quot;Oh child, I'm
                                                                                a monk. Do you think I became a ghost
                                                                                because I was sure of the answer to that
                                                                                question?&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                A few of the older students froze,
                                                                                looking up at the Hufflepuff ghost like
                                                                                they were seeing him for the first
                                                                                time.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Hm. Fair.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Hey, is it cool if I visit friends
                                                                                from other tables?&quot; I asked one of
                                                                                those older students.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Oh, sure,&quot; he said.
                                                                                &quot;Just, maybe not on the first day.
                                                                                I know how you feel, but don't worry,
                                                                                we're all friendly here! I'm Cedric, by
                                                                                the way- Uh� you okay?&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Yeah,&quot; I said from where I'd
                                                                                placed my forehead on the table.
                                                                                &quot;Just contemplating existence man.
                                                                                Coincidence, fate, the spinning wheel of
                                                                                false chance guided in truth by the
                                                                                choices we make everyday, invisible and
                                                                                visible alike.&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;...Mate, that sounds
                                                                                heavy.&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;I have strong shoulders for my
                                                                                age, Cedric.&quot;<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                &quot;Is he a nutter?&quot; one wizard
                                                                                whispered to a witch, who shrugged
                                                                                silently.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Other than that, dinner was pretty good.

                                                                            <div class="bbWrapper">Later, during
                                                                                dessert, questioning turned to matters
                                                                                of birth.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Muggleborn dude,� I told Cedric. �Born
                                                                                and raised.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Ah, lots of us are,� he said with a
                                                                                nod. �How�d you come here from
                                                                                America?�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �I didn�t. I�m also born British.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                The future Triwizard contestant stared
                                                                                at me. �Mate, you sound like Hollywood
                                                                                movie character!�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Ah, someone fired a gun in my presence
                                                                                once, and my blood has been American
                                                                                ever since.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Hannah squeaked in surprise. �C-Can that
                                                                                really happen?�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Susan Bones, a blonde witch with long
                                                                                plaited hair and a stocky build, sighed.
                                                                                �No, he�s just joking. Though it is
                                                                                weird.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �We live in a world of airplanes and
                                                                                dragons, my accent is not that
                                                                                weird.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Those are <i>normal</i>.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Fair. Perspective is everything I
                                                                                guess.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �How about you?� Cedric asked, though
                                                                                there was a hint of desperation to
                                                                                it.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �I�m a half-blood,� Susan said
                                                                                easily.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Oh right. Bones. Are you related
                                                                                to-�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �She�s my aunt,� Susan said with a hint
                                                                                of exasperation.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �My father knows her,� Cedric said. �He
                                                                                works in the Ministry as well.�<br />
                                                                                <br />

                                                                                strong mind.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Thus, I will not allow tomfoolery in
                                                                                this classroom under any circumstances,�
                                                                                she snapped, eyeing us all.
                                                                                �Transfiguration is some of the most
                                                                                complex and dangerous magic you will
                                                                                learn at Hogwarts. Anyone messing around
                                                                                in my classroom will leave and not come
                                                                                back. You have been warned.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Then she turned around and snapped her
                                                                                wand at her desk in a very firm and
                                                                                precise movement.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                The legs shifted into hoofs. One side
                                                                                became a snout, the other a spiral tail,
                                                                                while the wood turned into fuzzy pink
                                                                                flesh. A pig.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                The entire class buzzed with impressed
                                                                                noises. I watched carefully as she
                                                                                shifted the desk back again.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                My hand was up in an instant. Hermione
                                                                                was right there with me.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                McGonagall gave us both a look. �As much
                                                                                as I appreciate your curiosity, allow me
                                                                                to finish before I answer questions. You
                                                                                will all get your chance.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                I dropped my hand, but I immediately
                                                                                started scratching in my book. Desk to
                                                                                pig, then back again. That was a whole
                                                                                host of things to change!<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                I listed out things. The weight of a
                                                                                desk and pig, the requirements of energy
                                                                                to support life, complex life especially
                                                                                since pigs weren�t exactly simple
                                                                                compared to single cell creatures.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Actually, was it easier to transform
                                                                                single cell creatures? If I wanted to
                                                                                turn a bacteria into something, would I
                                                                                just need a microscope?<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Questions flowing through me, I looked
                                                                                back up as McGonagall continued the
                                                                                lesson.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Now, turning furniture into mammals is
                                                                                not something you learn immediately. One
                                                                                day, you may be capable of such feats.
                                                                                But you must start small.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                She waved her wand in a more casual way.
                                                                                A chalkboard flowed into the room,
                                                                                floating behind her and getting
                                                                                magically filled up with notes.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �It is agreed by experts in the field
                                                                                that what matters most in
                                                                                Transfiguration (t) is body weight (a),
                                                                                viciousness (v), wand power (w),
                                                                                concentration (c) and a fifth unknown
                                                                                variable (Z). This fifth is heavily
                                                                                theorized upon, but the equation as we
                                                                                know it goes as such.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                She displayed it.<br />
                                                                                <br />


                                                                                <img src="https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-nnSdzOWmJEr38iTzQjaXVHcWMc6jeLuausUmRdcopYR_4yXAWm-sI0b9Kjp3rsNuvc5Bx0OvsudGiloeRg9lX5sty60QwMyCMDU5GEak_zIrz4nM0cD5V2nBiUs5QvpJxCKzETSXiK3RDb3VcenxYACa7L-G8_0dMTK7gCPsAWqk3UbOK75ho-35kI8gQ"
                                                                                    data-url="https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-nnSdzOWmJEr38iTzQjaXVHcWMc6jeLuausUmRdcopYR_4yXAWm-sI0b9Kjp3rsNuvc5Bx0OvsudGiloeRg9lX5sty60QwMyCMDU5GEak_zIrz4nM0cD5V2nBiUs5QvpJxCKzETSXiK3RDb3VcenxYACa7L-G8_0dMTK7gCPsAWqk3UbOK75ho-35kI8gQ"
                                                                                    class="bbImage " style="" width=""
                                                                                    height="" />


                                                                                <br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Now that made sense. Of course wand
                                                                                power and concentration came together.
                                                                                And body weight coming into it also made
                                                                                sense? Viciousness though? The
                                                                                temperament of the thing you were
                                                                                transforming maybe?<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                I was about to raise my hand, but
                                                                                McGonagall gave me a small look that
                                                                                seemed to say, �wait�. But in a stern
                                                                                way.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                I sat back and listened, writing notes
                                                                                on one page, and questions on
                                                                                another.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                McGonagall went over the limitations,
                                                                                dangers, and various possibilities. I
                                                                                found more questions, wrote more notes,
                                                                                and dug in for the long haul. This shit
                                                                                was <i>interesting.</i><br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Then she dropped matches on our desks
                                                                                and told us to turn them into needles.
                                                                                And we could finally ask
                                                                                questions.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Hermione and I snapped our hands up,
                                                                                along with a few of the others.
                                                                                McGonagall, for the first time I�d met
                                                                                her, smiled as bright as any young girl,
                                                                                and pointed at Hermione for the first
                                                                                question.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                <hr class="bbc-hr bbc-hr--3" /><br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                In the end, I turned my match silver,
                                                                                but nothing else. I was fine with that.
                                                                                I had what I felt was the more important
                                                                                thing. Answers to my questions, as well
                                                                                as more questions.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                There was no way to state how important
                                                                                that was. I left class feeling pretty
                                                                                damn good. Ron and Harry met me outside
                                                                                the door.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Ugh, I think my head is going to
                                                                                explode already,� Ron grumbled.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �I didn�t expect math in a magic class,�
                                                                                Harry agreed.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �It was crazy interesting though,� I
                                                                                said.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Of course you think that,� Ron sighed.
                                                                                �I didn�t understand some of your
                                                                                questions. Conservation of matter? What
                                                                                is that?�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �It�s important,� I said simply.
                                                                                �Transfiguration has a lot of
                                                                                possibilities. Even if I don�t end up
                                                                                having the knack for it, I want to know
                                                                                the rules. Once I know what is deemed
                                                                                possible, I can get to work.� I
                                                                                chuckled. �Well. My next class is
                                                                                Herbology. You guys?�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Charms,� Harry said. �And this time I
                                                                                asked McGonagall how to get
                                                                                there.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Thankfully I saw the way there last
                                                                                night. Want to meet for lunch? I�m
                                                                                buying.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Lunch is free,� Ron pointed out.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Then I�ll throw in drinks! Later
                                                                                guys.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Harry and I traded handshakes, Ron and I
                                                                                shared a nod, and we went our separate
                                                                                ways.<br />
                                                                                <hr class="bbc-hr bbc-hr--3" />

                                                                                tomorrow, with the rest of it on my <a

                                                                            <div class="bbWrapper">Well, not every class

                                                                                <br />

                                                                                Gryffindor supposed to get them for this
                                                                                class? Or was that a second year thing?
                                                                                I still didn�t understand the school
                                                                                schedule.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Regardless, Hufflepuffs and Slytherins
                                                                                were already waiting in front of the
                                                                                Greenhouses before class, waiting for
                                                                                Professor Sprout, aka my Head of House
                                                                                who I�d yet to really speak with.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                I was surprised to see Draco there
                                                                                early, but it made sense. As much of a
                                                                                dick as the kid was, he�d always been
                                                                                good in class in the books and
                                                                                movies.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                I was unsurprised to see Daphne. While
                                                                                she didn�t show up often, something
                                                                                about my first meeting with her made me
                                                                                think she was the studious type. The
                                                                                instant she saw me waiting, her eyes
                                                                                narrowed, and she stalked over to me,
                                                                                Tracey following.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �So,� she said firmly. �You weren�t
                                                                                lying.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Lying is a waste of time,� I said.
                                                                                �It�s fine to lie to children, animals,
                                                                                and the sick. You don�t lie to peers
                                                                                when you can work on the problem
                                                                                instead.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                She scoffed. �You consider yourself my
                                                                                peer, <i>muggleborn</i>?�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Well, no. But you�ll work your way up
                                                                                to it one day.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                The blonde gave me an icy look, then
                                                                                sucked in a shot of air, ignoring the
                                                                                other students watching us. �You won the
                                                                                bet. What was it you wanted?�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �For you to give every idea I have a
                                                                                fair shot,� I reminded her.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �What does that mean?� Tracey asked,
                                                                                cocking her head to the side.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                In answer, I took my last set of office
                                                                                supplies and passed them over to Daphne.
                                                                                She took the pack and looked inside.
                                                                                Then she gave me a look like I�d spat in
                                                                                her face.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �What do <i>I</i> need with muggle
                                                                                things?�<br />
                                                                                <br />

                                                                                blushed, looking appalled she�d revealed
                                                                                knowledge of filthy muggle things. I
                                                                                continued on. �I want you to give them a
                                                                                chance. An honest-to-god chance. Use the
                                                                                pens instead of quills, take notes on
                                                                                these,� I pointed at the sticky notes,
                                                                                then displayed my herbology notebook.
                                                                                I�d already stuck a few dozen of the
                                                                                notes in the pages. When I opened it up,
                                                                                one could see where I�d highlighted
                                                                                sections of the book.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �You drew in your book?� she asked
                                                                                skeptically.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �I noted the most important details for
                                                                                quick reference and study.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                She looked back in the bag. �I already
                                                                                have a self refilling ink quill. I do
                                                                                not need the pens.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Use them anyways,� I shrugged at the
                                                                                annoyed look she gave me. �I asked you
                                                                                to give my ideas a shot. I didn�t say
                                                                                you couldn�t criticize them and
                                                                                recommend better options.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �...What is your end goal?� Daphne
                                                                                crossed her arms. Tracey looked between
                                                                                us. �You don�t just want me to use
                                                                                these. You have a point.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �My end goal�� I rubbed my chin
                                                                                thoughtfully. �...I want to make
                                                                                money.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �How banal,� she said.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �No, you misunderstand. I don�t want to
                                                                                <i>just</i> make money. I want what
                                                                                money brings. Power and freedom. I want
                                                                                to become more wealthy than anyone in
                                                                                the world. I want enough cash to move
                                                                                problems and make solutions. I want to
                                                                                take over any industry that has my
                                                                                interest, then turn that industry to
                                                                                making my family and friends
                                                                                comfortable,� I couldn�t control the
                                                                                excitement in my voice.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �I�ve seen wizards and muggles who
                                                                                <i>settle.</i> Fuck that!� I snapped the
                                                                                words just a bit, startling both girls
                                                                                and Zach, who had been listening
                                                                                closely. I couldn�t help it. I was one
                                                                                of those who settled once. Never
                                                                                again.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �One day, I�m gonna be sitting on a
                                                                                tower looking over an empire of my
                                                                                making. I�ll have a cold drink in one
                                                                                hand and all the power in the world to
                                                                                protect what is mine.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Daphne cocked her head to the side. �You
                                                                                were right. You aren�t Hufflepuff
                                                                                material.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Oh, you�re wrong about that,� I
                                                                                grinned. �Hufflepuff is loyal. But it�s
                                                                                also hard-working. Besides, your
                                                                                majesty. I like badgers. Badgers are
                                                                                <i>savage</i> when it comes to taking
                                                                                what they want.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                She ignored that, I think. �You still
                                                                                haven�t explained these.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Marketing campaign. I want tons of
                                                                                people using them, realizing their
                                                                                potential, letting me know what won�t
                                                                                sell, while also giving me advice on how
                                                                                to improve them with magic.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �But you�ve been giving them away,� Zach
                                                                                said. The three of us turned to him. He
                                                                                looked unashamed at having been caught
                                                                                eavesdropping. �You can�t sell something
                                                                                that you�re giving away, right?�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Tracey looked just as lost. Daphne, on
                                                                                the other hand, snapped her eyes back to
                                                                                meet mine. Then she smiled. It wasn�t a
                                                                                nice smile, but I liked the look of
                                                                                shrewdness it gave her. �I see.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                With that, she placed the stuff in the
                                                                                backpack into her own bag, then tossed
                                                                                the actual backpack to me. �I will not
                                                                                be needing that. I do not wish for back
                                                                                problems.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Fair enough.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                As I folded up the backpack, three
                                                                                others approached us.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Speaking to our lessers again, are we,
                                                                                Greengrass?� a mocking voice said. She
                                                                                looked over at him, then scoffed.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �If I was to speak to my lessers,
