                                                                                I!?�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Go to goddamn hell, you�� I grumbled
                                                                                the rest and quickly continued on. That
                                                                                was my first mistake. Peeves wasn�t
                                                                                someone who liked being ignored.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Chalk landed on my back. I growled and
                                                                                kept moving.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                A wastebasket nearly took my head
                                                                                off.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �WHAT DO YOU WANT!?� I spun, glaring at
                                                                                Peeves.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Ohhhh, he�s mad! How cute!�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �I swear to god, I�m going to make a
                                                                                proton pack just so I can shove you deep
                                                                                into an elephant�s colon and watch you
                                                                                choke inside it!� <br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Peeves grabbed the rug under me and
                                                                                pulled. I leaped up just as he did,
                                                                                avoiding getting tripped, then ran for
                                                                                it.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                A hail of chalk, wastepaper baskets, and
                                                                                inkwells followed my path. I went as
                                                                                fast as I could, using every parkour
                                                                                trick I�d practiced back home, leaping
                                                                                over banisters and ducking through
                                                                                tapestries. <br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Peeves knew the school better than
                                                                                anyone alive. He was a fucking menace,
                                                                                chasing and pelting me, moving ahead to
                                                                                get me again, grabbing my robes and
                                                                                pulling hard with cackling
                                                                                laughter.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Then I reached the Astronomy Tower. And
                                                                                it was hell.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Stairs, going up. That was it. No
                                                                                dodging, no hiding. Only a tight space I
                                                                                had to rush through as fast as I
                                                                                could.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                I got ink on my shoulder, chalk dust in
                                                                                my hair, and a rotten banana stuck to my
                                                                                back. Peeves got the last fucking
                                                                                laugh.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                When I finally arrived on the top floor,
                                                                                Peeves disappeared, giggling like a
                                                                                madman. I grit my teeth, entering the
                                                                                class. Which was really just an empty
                                                                                rooftop.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Oh my!� an older black woman in cream
                                                                                colored robes wearing a hat was the only
                                                                                one present. She stared at me as I
                                                                                approached. �What happened to
                                                                                you?�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Peeves,� I growled.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                A look of understanding appeared. She
                                                                                took out her wand and waved it at me.
                                                                                �Scourgify!�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                The ink, chalk, and banana disappeared
                                                                                along with all the other stuff on me
                                                                                that I hadn�t tracked.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                The anger remained. Proton packs had
                                                                                risen a lot higher on the list. Or a
                                                                                portal to hell I could shove him into.
                                                                                Maybe make him corporeal and just start
                                                                                beating his ass. Whatever was most
                                                                                satisfying.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Oh!� Professor Sinistra noticed my
                                                                                books. �I believe I have that
                                                                                one.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                That didn�t surprise me until I realized
                                                                                she was looking at the muggle one.
                                                                                �Really?�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �Yes. Muggles have made some great
                                                                                advances in the field of Astronomy,� she
                                                                                said happily. �They get some things
                                                                                wrong, but not many.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Now that was interesting. �So I guess
                                                                                knowing they�ve been to the moon won�t
                                                                                blow your mind?�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �I believe that was faked, wasn�t it?�
                                                                                she said, cocking her head to the
                                                                                side.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                �...We should have a talk, I
                                                                                think.�<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                And that�s how I met one more future
                                                                                business partner. And made a mortal
                                                                                enemy.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                Granted, I don�t think Peeves considered
                                                                                me as such, but I�d be making an effort
                                                                                to keep that dickhead from messing with
                                                                                me again.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                The rest of the day was much calmer,
                                                                                just Charms, Transfiguration, and
                                                                                Herbology. Still, I did end up
                                                                                confirming a pattern and made sure to
                                                                                confront it.<br />
                                                                                <hr class="bbc-hr bbc-hr--3" />
                                                                                <i>Author's Note: </i>Peeves is
                                                                                invincible. Nothing Gar can ever do will
                                                                                ever beat him entirely.<br />
                                                                                <br />
                                                                                And that's fine. Gar needs somethings
                                                                                that he just can't match up to <img
                                                                                    src="/styles/sbforums/smilies/biggrin.gif"
                                                                                    class="smilie" loading="lazy"
                                                                                    alt=":D" title="Big Grin    :D"
                                                                                    data-shortname=":D" /><br />
